context_of_use: This use case allows users to securely access the system by registering, logging in, and resetting passwords.
description: Allows users to register, log in, and reset passwords to securely access the system.
triggering_event: User initiates account registration, login, or password reset.
preconditions: User must have valid information for registration or login.
postconditions: User is logged in to the system.
assumptions: User has a device capable of accessing the system.
User understands the registration and login process.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to register an account.
The system shall allow users to log in to their accounts.
The system shall allow users to reset their passwords.
main_flow: 1. user registers account → system creates user account and confirms registration.
2. user logs in → system verifies credentials and grants access.
3. user resets password → system updates password and confirms reset.
